id: Kristin Chenoweth is performing at the Tabernacle Choir's annual Christmas concert
paragraph: By Harmeet Kaur, CNNUpdated 5:06 PM ET, Sat October 20, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
